page.title: 09Crops at Bestland Farms
page.content: Bestland Farms grow 80 acres of hard milling{winter wheat}annually. This goes to a mill in Wellingborough and is used for the making of{bread.} The 30 acres of soft milling winter wheat is transported to Carlisle for {biscuit production.} { Oil-seed rape}is grown on 85 acres of the farm and the crop eventually goes to Liverpool to be refined into {cooking oil}and{margarine.} Each year, the 40 acres of{winter } {barley}grown is sold to West Germany, where it is used for the brewing of {lager.} The remaining 5 acres are used to produce a crop of{French White Lupin,} used for animal feed at home and human consumption in the third world.The small crop of{peas}is used for both animal and human food.
